Credit Risk Modeling

Credit Risk Modeling using Home Credit Dataset

12 February 2023

Using Python, I build and evaluate a logistic regression model under Naive Bayes assumption with Weight of Evidence transformed features to predict the probability of default for 307,511 loans in the Kaggle Home Credit dataset.

2
